mdRecord.dcterms:description: Closeup showing water and pine needles trapped in crevice

The sculpture is the fourth of four works commissioned from members of the National Sculpture Society by philanthropist Paul Goodloe McIntire during the years 1919 to 1924. Statue removed, 2021. ; Inscription: front of base, George Rogers Clark [work]
